languages.text: "Покинуть Лилэтан — тяжелое решение. Но Путь ведет меня дальше... на поиски братьев и сестер. Чтобы найти их, я пойду на любую жертву".
"Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."
languages.original_text: "Покинуть Лилэтан — тяжелое решение. Но Путь ведет меня дальше... на поиски братьев и сестер. Чтобы найти их, я пойду на любую жертву".

languages.text: “离开莉莱赞是个艰难的决定，但我的道途指引着我向前……寻找我的兄弟姐妹。为了找到他们，我愿意做出任何牺牲。”
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."

traits.locale_text: “离开莉莱赞是个艰难的决定，但我的道途指引着我向前……寻找我的兄弟姐妹。为了找到他们，我愿意做出任何牺牲。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Quitter la lilaethan est une décision difficile, mais ma Voie me pousse à avancer... pour chercher mes frères et mes sœurs. Je ne reculerai devant aucun sacrifice pour les retrouver. »
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."

traits.locale_text: « Quitter la lilaethan est une décision difficile, mais ma Voie me pousse à avancer... pour chercher mes frères et mes sœurs. Je ne reculerai devant aucun sacrifice pour les retrouver. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Dejar el Lilaethan es una decisión difícil. Pero mi Senda me impulsa a seguir... a buscar a mis hermanos y hermanas. Sacrificaré lo que sea por encontrarlos».
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."

traits.locale_text: «Dejar el Lilaethan es una decisión difícil. Pero mi Senda me impulsa a seguir... a buscar a mis hermanos y hermanas. Sacrificaré lo que sea por encontrarlos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「リラエタンを離れるというのは難しい決断だ。しかし私の道が私を前に進めてくれる…同胞を探すために。そのためならば、私はどんな犠牲もいとわない」
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."

traits.locale_text: 「リラエタンを離れるというのは難しい決断だ。しかし私の道が私を前に進めてくれる…同胞を探すために。そのためならば、私はどんな犠牲もいとわない」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Lileath zu verlassen, ist eine schwierige Entscheidung. Doch mein Pfad führt mich weiter ... um nach meinen Brüdern und Schwestern zu suchen. Ich bringe jedes Opfer, um sie zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."

traits.locale_text: "Die Lileath zu verlassen, ist eine schwierige Entscheidung. Doch mein Pfad führt mich weiter ... um nach meinen Brüdern und Schwestern zu suchen. Ich bringe jedes Opfer, um sie zu finden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."

languages.text: "Lilaethan'dan ayrılmak zor bir karar oldu. Ancak Yolum beni ileriye götürüyor, kardeşlerimi aramaya sevk ediyor. Onları bulmak uğruna gereken her fedakârlığı yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "Leaving the Lilaethan is a difficult decision. But my Path leads me onward... to search for my brothers and sisters. I will make any sacrifice to find them."
